(Oh, Dcoburn, yay, just the person I wanted to talk to.  Shut the 
hell up.  The best you can do is yell and call names to people?  If 
that's your best then just be quiet.  It's unproductive and it is 
irritating as hell since it has no purpose.  You want to complain 
like a ninny, do it PRIVATELY.  Dewboy's ideas have been creative and 
interesting, the only problem is they don't fit in that well with the 
RPG and once he gets used to it he'll have some pretty darn good 
ideas, and I'm betting far better ones than you have ever or will 
ever come up with.

So, to simplify, shut up with the OOCs where you insult everyone, 
ja?  Gut.

-Uni
"'Cause you're not shooting, why?"
